name: Imperial Historical Center
description: Made of buildings, historical monuments and museums, the Imperial Historical Center is a unique place where you can learn about the history of the Empire.

name: Statue of Hercules
description: The Statue of Hercules is a monumental sculpture of the Greek hero Hercules.Mounted in 1847, it is the work of German masters Rammelmeyer and Glantz.

name: The Royal Historical Center
description: It dates from the royal time (interwar period): Dr. CrÄƒciunescu Villa, Cerna Hotel, The eye spring, The somach spring.

name: Elisabeth Villa
description: Empress Elisabeth visited the spa town on several ocasions, and in 1887, she spent six weeks in a villa specially arranged for her (the building needs to be rehabilitated).

name: The Austrian Imperial Baths
description: The baths where Franz Joseph, empress Elisabeth, Nicolae Iorga, Mihail Sadoveanu and many other personalities where treated.
